security_audit.summary: Pure documentation skill containing only markdown evaluation criteria. No executable code, network calls, or filesystem access. All 18 static findings are false positives: hex color codes were misidentified as cryptographic algorithms, SHA-256 hashes were flagged as C2 keywords, and documentation URLs were marked as network issues.

content.user_title: Audit NGX funnels with scoring criteria
content.value_statement: Marketing teams struggle to consistently evaluate landing pages and checkout flows. This skill provides a standardized 100-point audit framework with visual identity, copy, UX, and conversion checklists for NGX funnels.
actual_capabilities: Audit landing pages against NGX visual identity standards
Score UX elements including mobile responsiveness and CTAs
Assess conversion elements like proof social and guarantees
Generate structured audit reports with 100-point scoring
Identify red flags that block conversion rates
limitations: Does not access live websites or perform automated testing
Requires manual input of page URL and content for evaluation
Does not generate code or implement design changes
Criteria optimized specifically for NGX brand standards

use_cases.title: Landing page audits
use_cases.description: Systematically audit new landing pages before launch using standardized 100-point criteria

use_cases.title: Copy compliance review
use_cases.description: Verify marketing copy follows brand voice guidelines and avoids prohibited terms

use_cases.title: Conversion gap analysis
use_cases.description: Identify friction points in checkout flows and optimize conversion rates

best_practices: Use the complete 100-point framework for thorough audits
Prioritize red flags like invisible CTA, slow load, or too many form fields
Score each category separately to identify specific improvement areas
anti_patterns: Using generic audit criteria instead of NGX-specific standards
Focusing only on copy without checking UX elements

faq.question: What platforms does this skill work with?
faq.answer: Works with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code. Use it for any landing page audit regardless of platform.

faq.question: What is the scoring range?
faq.answer: Scores range from 0-100. 90+ is excellent, 70-89 is good, 50-69 needs work, below 50 is critical.

faq.question: Does this access my website automatically?
faq.answer: No. You provide the URL and content manually. The skill evaluates based on your input only.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: Yes. No data leaves your session. This is a prompt-based skill with no external connections.

faq.question: Can I use this for non-NGX pages?
faq.answer: Yes, but criteria are optimized for NGX brand standards. Adapt scoring weights for other brands.

faq.question: How is this different from other audit tools?
faq.answer: Provides NGX-specific criteria including agent mentions, brand voice formula, and marketing flow checks.
